Product.title: iPhone 16 Pro Max
Product.description: The ultimate iPhone experience with advanced technology and pro-level features.
displayFeatures: ProMotion technology with adaptive refresh rates up to 120Hz
chipFeatures: 6-core CPU with 2 performance and 4 efficiency cores
Product.camera: Pro camera system (48MP Fusion, 48MP Ultra Wide, and 12MP Telephoto)
cameraFeatures: Next-generation portraits with Focus and Depth Control
videoRecording: 4K Dolby Vision video recording at 24 fps, 25 fps, 30 fps, 60 fps, 100 fps (Fusion), or 120 fps (Fusion)
1080p Dolby Vision video recording at 25 fps, 30 fps, 60 fps, or 120 fps (Fusion)
Cinematic mode for recording videos with shallow depth of field (up to 4K Dolby Vision at 30 fps)
Action mode
Spatial video recording at 1080p at 30 fps
ProRes video recording up to 4K at 120 fps with external recording
Log video recording
Macro video recording, including slo-mo and time-lapse
Slo-mo video support for 1080p at 120 fps or 240 fps
Academy Color Encoding System
Time-lapse video with stabilization
Night mode Time-lapse
Slo-mo video support for 1080p up to 240 fps and 4K Dolby Vision up to 120 fps (Fusion)
QuickTake video (up to 4K at 60 fps in Dolby Vision HDR)
Audio zoom
Second-generation sensor-shift optical image stabilization for video
Spatial Audio and stereo recording
Wind noise reduction
frontCameraFeatures: Next-generation portraits with Focus and Depth Control
4K Dolby Vision video recording at 24 fps, 25 fps, 30 fps, or 60 fps
1080p Dolby Vision video recording at 25 fps, 30 fps, or 60 fps
cellularAndWireless: Precision dual-frequency GPS (GPS, GLONASS, Galileo, QZSS, BeiDou, and NavIC)
Product.secureAuthentication: Face ID enabled by TrueDepth front camera for facial recognition
applePay: Pay with your iPhone using Face ID in stores, within apps, and on the web
Send and receive money in Messages with Apple Cash
Pay for your ride using Express Transit
videoCalling: Initiate video calls over cellular or Wi-Fi to any FaceTime-enabled device
Share experiences like movies, TV, music, and other apps in a FaceTime call with SharePlay
audioCalling: Initiate audio calls over cellular or Wi-Fi to any FaceTime audio-enabled device
Share experiences like movies, TV, music, and other apps in a FaceTime call with SharePlay
videoPlayback: HDR with Dolby Vision, HDR10+/HDR10, and HLG
siri: Get help with everyday tasks like sending messages, setting reminders, and more
Activate hands-free with only your voice using “Siri” or “Hey Siri,” or use Type to Siri
Protected by the strongest privacy of any intelligent assistant
Powered by Apple Intelligence, Siri is more natural and helpful
powerAndBattery: MagSafe, Qi2, and Qi wireless charging

Fast-charge capable: Up to 50% charge in 35 minutes with 30W adapter or higher (available separately) paired with USB-C charging cable, or 30W adapter or higher paired with MagSafe Charger (both available separately)
Product.simCard: Dual eSIM Two active eSIMs; stores eight or more eSIMs. Supports advanced eSIM technology for more convenience and security (not compatible with physical SIM cards)
Product.splashWaterDustResistant: Rated IP68 (maximum depth of 6 meters up to 30 minutes) under IEC standard 60529

Product.title: Apple Vision Pro
Product.description: Apple’s first spatial computer, seamlessly blending digital content with your physical space for immersive experiences in work, entertainment, and collaboration.
displayFeatures: EyeSight external display for showing user’s eyes
Product.chip: Dual-chip design with M2 and R1
chipFeatures: M2: 8-core CPU, 10-core GPU, 16-core Neural Engine, 16GB unified memory
R1: Processes input from cameras, sensors, and microphones with 12ms latency
audio: Spatial Audio with dynamic head tracking
Supports AAC, MP3, Apple Lossless, FLAC, Dolby Digital, Dolby Digital Plus, Dolby Atmos
H2-to-H2 ultra-low-latency connection to AirPods Pro (2nd generation) with MagSafe Charging Case (USB-C)
video: Supports HEVC, MV-HEVC, H.264, HDR with Dolby Vision, HDR10, HLG
Apple Immersive Video (180-degree 3D 8K with Spatial Audio)
Up to 720p AirPlay mirroring to AirPlay-enabled devices
input: Supports virtual keyboard, Siri, Bluetooth accessories (Magic Keyboard, Magic Trackpad, gamepads)
powerAndBattery: Up to 2 hours of general use
Up to 2.5 hours of video playback
Exceeds U.S. Department of Energy requirements for battery charger systems
design: Three-dimensionally formed laminated glass with aluminum alloy frame
Solo Knit Band and Dual Loop Band included
Weight: 600–650 grams (varies by Light Seal and head band configuration)
durability: Materials: Aluminum, glass, polyester, nylon, polycarbonate
No specific water or dust resistance rating
accessibility: Built-in support for vision, hearing, mobility, and learning
Features for people with disabilities to create and interact
environmentalFeatures: No established final assembly sites generate waste sent to landfill (Apple’s Zero Waste Program)
All final assembly supplier sites transitioning to 100% renewable energy
Free of PVC and phthalates (except AC power cords in India, Thailand, South Korea pending approval)
Complies with EU Directive 2011/65/EU for restricted substances
